title: "This Week In Smashville" - Nystrom sentimental about Islanders move from Long Island
text:
"This Week In Smashville" - Nystrom sentimental about Islanders move from Long Island 
Updated: Wed, Oct 14 2015, 11:07 PM 
Stream WZTV Fox 17 Newscasts LIVE starting with Fox 17 This Morning at 4:30am, News at 5:30pm and News at 9pm & 10 pm 

The Nashville Predators play the New York Islanders Thursday night. This game marking the first time the two teams have not played an Isles home game on Long Island. 
Eric Nystrom, whose father Bob is an Islanders legend, discusses New York's move to Brooklyn. 

Follow the FOX 17 Sports Team on Twitter: Paul Jones | Dan Phillips | Dave Foster
